node.name: Vaadin Plugin for Eclipse
node.shortdescription:
Vaadin is an open source UI library for rich web user interfaces. It is a single jar component library that makes it easy for Java developers to create stunning web applications - no need for any JavaScript or XML programming:

Label l = new Label("Hello Vaadin User");
layout.addComponent(l);

Find the list of components and sample code at http://demo.vaadin.com/

The Vaadin Plugin for Eclipse comes with project wizard and samples and WYSIWYG visual designer for Vaadin web user interfaces.

Version 2.1 adds support for Vaadin 7.
node.body:
Vaadin is an open source UI library for rich web user interfaces. It is a single jar component library that makes it easy for Java developers to create stunning web applications - no need for any JavaScript or XML programming:

Label l = new Label("Hello Vaadin User");
layout.addComponent(l);

Find the list of components and sample code at http://demo.vaadin.com/

The Vaadin Plugin for Eclipse comes with project wizard and samples and WYSIWYG visual designer for Vaadin web user interfaces.

Version 2.1 adds support for Vaadin 7.
